I had the DVD set but at this price and smaller size in my Sci-Fi collection it seemed like a good time to replace with bluray.

Amazing season I love the X-files. I personally love every single season just as much as the next. They are all well written episodes that keep you watching. Great picture quality on the Blu-ray discs.

Love the X Files and this has helped to complete my X Files on Blu Ray collection. Sure, I can see the X Files on streaming services but the streaming services do not have the extra features that the blu ray provides, so to me this is worth it.
